text: Tropic of Emerald or De gordel van smaragd is a 1997 Belgian Indonesian Dutch drama movie directed by Orlow Seunke and starring Pierre Bokma, Esmée de la Bretonière, Christine Hakim, Bram van der Vlugt, Frans Tumbuan, Piet Kamerman. ==Other websites== * Category:1997 drama movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:Indonesian movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Movies directed by Orlow Seunke Category:Movies set in Indonesia
title: Tropic of Emerald
